Action.Name: Index

Action.Command: <IndexPageActionCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" ContentType="text/html"> <Page SettingType="IndexPage"> <ToolBar Tag="div" ID="toolbar" Class="toolbar-panel" PageID="P01011"> <Buttons> <UIButton Tag="a" ID="btn-search" Class="easyui-linkbutton normal-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-search',plain:true" Title="检索" ActionValue="2" Action="showActDlg('检索','/Page/P01011/Search',400,300)" /> <UIButton Tag="a" ID="btn-detail" Class="easyui-linkbutton toolradio normal-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-detail',plain:true" Title="查看" ActionValue="32" Action="showActDlg_DGItemActDlg('datagrid', '查看', '/Page/P01011/Detail', 400, 300)" /> <UIButton Tag="a" ID="btn-create" Class="easyui-linkbutton normal-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-add',plain:true" Title="新增" ActionValue="4" Action="showActDlg('新增', '/Page/P01011/Create', 400, 300)" /> <UIButton Tag="a" ID="btn-edit" Class="easyui-linkbutton toolradio normal-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-edit',plain:true" Title="修改" ActionValue="8" Action="showActDlg_DGItemActDlg('datagrid', '修改', '/Page/P01011/Edit', 400, 300)" /> <UIButton Tag="a" ID="btn-edu" Class="easyui-linkbutton toolradio normal-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-edit',plain:true" Title="教育经历" ActionValue="64" Action="showActDlg_DGItemActDlg('datagrid', '教育经历', '/Page/P01011/Education', 400, 300)" /> <UIButton Tag="a" ID="btn-job" Class="easyui-linkbutton toolradio normal-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-edit',plain:true" Title="工作经历" ActionValue="128" Action="showActDlg_DGItemActDlg('datagrid', '工作经历', '/Page/P01011/Job', 400, 300)" /> <UIButton Tag="a" ID="btn-skill" Class="easyui-linkbutton toolradio normal-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-edit',plain:true" Title="职业技能" ActionValue="256" Action="showActDlg_DGItemActDlg('datagrid', '职业技能', '/Page/P01011/Skill', 400, 300)" /> <UIButton Tag="a" ID="btn-familie" Class="easyui-linkbutton toolradio normal-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-edit',plain:true" Title="社会关系" ActionValue="512" Action="showActDlg_DGItemActDlg('datagrid', '社会关系', '/Page/P01011/Familie', 400, 300)" /> <UIButton Tag="a" ID="btn-other" Class="easyui-linkbutton toolradio normal-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-edit',plain:true" Title="其他" ActionValue="1024" Action="showActDlg_DGItemActDlg('datagrid', '其他', '/Page/P01011/Other', 400, 300)" /> <UIButton Tag="a" ID="btn-delete" Class="easyui-linkbutton toolmultiple normal-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-cancel',plain:true" Title="删除" ActionValue="16" Action="showActDlg_DGItemsConfirm('datagrid', '删除', '确认删除选择项?', '/Page/P01011/Delete', 400, 300)" /> <UIButton Tag="a" ID="btn-createuser" Class="easyui-linkbutton toolradio normal-button hide_IsValid_启用_停用" Options="iconCls:'icon-add',plain:true" Title="创建账户" ActionValue="2048" Action="showActDlg_DGItemCreateUser('datagrid','创建账户','确认创建账户?','/Page/P01011/CreateUser')" /> <UIButton Tag="a" ID="btn-set" Class="easyui-linkbutton toolradio normal-button hide_UserName_无" Options="iconCls:'icon-edit',plain:true" Title="账户设置" ActionValue="4096" Action="showActDlg_DGItemActDlg('datagrid', '账户设置', '/Page/P01011/UserSet', 400, 300)" /> <UIButton Tag="a" ID="btn-import" Class="easyui-linkbutton normal-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-import',plain:true" Title="导入" ActionValue="8192" Action="showActDlg('导入','/Page/P01011/Import',400,300)" /> <UIButton /> </Buttons> </ToolBar> <DataGrid Tag="table" ID="datagrid" Class="easyui-datagrid" Options="url:'/Page/P01011/Query',fitColumns:true,fit:true,pagination: true,rownumbers: true,nowrap: true,striped: true,collapsible: false,resizable:true,onClickRow:oncheckstate,onSelect:oncheckstate,onCheck:oncheckstate,onCheckAll:oncheckstate,onUncheckAll:oncheckstate,onUncheck:oncheckstate,onUnselect:oncheckstate" Key="EmployeeID"> <Column Title="ID" FieldName="EmployeeID" IsCheckBox="true" /> <Column Title="部门" FieldName="DeptName" /> <Column HAlign="Center" Title="职位" FieldName="JobName" /> <Column HAlign="Center" Title="姓名" FieldName="Name" /> <Column Title="性别" FieldName="Sex" /> <Column Title="身份证" FieldName="CardNo" /> <Column HAlign="Center" Title="出生日期" FieldName="Birthday" /> <Column Title="民族" FieldName="Nation" /> <Column Title="婚姻状况" FieldName="Marriage" /> <Column Title="政治面貌" FieldName="Politics" /> <Column Title="籍贯" FieldName="Native" /> <Column Title="现住址" FieldName="LiveAddress" /> <Column HAlign="Center" Title="联系电话" FieldName="MobiPhone" /> <Column Title="文化程度" FieldName="Education" /> <Column HAlign="Center" Title="入职日期" FieldName="HireDate" /> <Column Title="系统账号" FieldName="UserName" /> <Column Title="账号状态" FieldName="IsValid" /> </DataGrid> </Page> </IndexPageActionCommand>

Action.Name: Search
Action.Title: 检索
Action.Command: <EditDialogActionCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" ContentType="text/html"> <Page SettingType="EditDialog"> <Form ID="dataform" Class="form-dialog"> <TableLayout /> <Fields> <Field Title="关键字" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="Key" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox" Options="prompt:'请输入姓名、卡号或手机号码'" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="部门" FieldType="ComboTree"> <ComboTree Tag="input" Name="DeptID" Class="edit-input easyui-combotree" Options="editable:false" IsRequired="false" DataUrl="/Share/Query?name=GetAllComAndDptTree&resultformat=jsontree&root=&pid=PID&id=ID&text=Name" DisplayMember="text" ValueMember="id" IsAutoHeight="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="职位" FieldType="ComboBox"> <ComboBox Tag="input" Name="JobID" Class="edit-input easyui-combobox" Options="editable:false" IsRequired="false" DisplayMember="Name" ValueMember="ID" DataUrl="/Share/Query?name=GetAllJob" IsAutoHeight="false" /> </Field> </Fields> <ErrorMessage ID="showmsg" Class="showmsg" /> <ToolBar Tag="div" ID="toolbar" Class="dialog-button" PageID="P01011"> <Buttons> <UIButton ID="btn-query" Class="easyui-linkbutton edit-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-ok'" Title="确定" ActionValue="2" Action="submitAct_DGReplace('dataform','/Page/P01011/Query','datagrid')" /> <UIButton Tag="a" ID="btn-cancel" Class="easyui-linkbutton edit-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-cancel'" Title="取消" Action="cancel()" /> </Buttons> </ToolBar> </Form> </Page> </EditDialogActionCommand>

Action.Name: Query

Command.Name: 编辑页面
Command.Description: 这个命令会直接返回到客户端，无需后继命令

Action.Command: <EditDialogActionCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" ContentType="text/html"> <Parameter Name="Data" Path="Results[查询编辑].Items" Type="Parameter" /> <Page SettingType="EditDialog"> <Form ID="dataform" Class="form-dialog" DataBinding="Parameters[Data]"> <TableLayout /> <Fields> <Field Title="EmployeeID" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="EmployeeID" Class="edit-input " InputType="hidden" Binding="EmployeeID" IsHidden="true" /> </Field> <Field Title="Name" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="Name" Class="edit-input" InputType="hidden" Binding="Name" IsHidden="true" /> </Field> <Field Title="系统账号" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="UserName" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox" Options="missingMessage:'请先设置系统账号'" Binding="UserName" IsReadOnly="true" /> </Field> <Field Title="状态" FieldType="ComboBox"> <ComboBox Tag="input" Name="IsValid" Class="edit-input easyui-combobox" Options="editable:false,missingMessage:'请选择状态'" Binding="IsValid" DisplayMember="Name" ValueMember="Code" DataUrl="/Share/GetSystemCodes?code=C045" /> </Field> <Field Title="Email" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="Email" Class="edit-input" InputType="hidden" Binding="Email" IsHidden="true" /> </Field> </Fields> <ToolBar Tag="div" ID="toolbar" Class="dialog-button" PageID="P01011"> <Buttons> <UIButton Tag="a" ID="btn-update" Class="easyui-linkbutton edit-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-ok'" Title="确定" ActionValue="16" Action="submitAct_DGUpdate('dataform','/Page/P01011/UpdateSet','datagrid')" /> <UIButton Tag="a" ID="btn-cancel" Class="easyui-linkbutton edit-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-cancel'" Title="取消" Action="cancel()" /> </Buttons> </ToolBar> </Form> </Page> </EditDialogActionCommand>
